title: No Epic Mystery Skin reward for new mission
body:
I purchased 2 rune pages before the new runes update and played a match to complete the Rune Archivist mission and was rewarded the icon but was not rewarded an Epic Mystery Skin.
 It's not in my Loot section, I checked all characters I own in my collection section and looked at their skin layouts and did not see any skin that I do not already own. 
So does anyone else have this problem?? Can I put a support ticket in for this?
Someone please help me out, I could have just bought an Epic Skin instead of these rune pages if I knew it was going to screw me out of one.

replies.body: The skin is not a shard, so it would automatically unlock on your account and show up on your purchase history.  It looks like you got Glacial Malphite, grats!
I had 8-10 rune pages long before rune reforged was even announced. Is there a reason I wasn't rewarded skins? :/
yeah I also didn't get the rune archivist mission nor any skin rewards even I though I got the 7 page bundle back even before the new client came out on the legacy client as its referred to now :(
